title: Hyundai Motor’s Humanoid Robot Debate and Korea’s Real AI Challenge
desc: While the Hyundai Motor case now sits at the center of Korea’s AI jobs debate, the evidence suggests that the nation’s more immediate constraints are weak productivity growth and uneven labor-market adjustment—not large-scale technological displacement. How Korea responds will shape its competitiveness in a high-cost, aging manufacturing economy under intensifying global competition.

title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
desc: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.
